hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1514 a and today's date is March
6th 2018 and the tot of the episode is
we are approaching the point where the
economic illusion is going to be
shattered let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we've been
watching a complete breakdown of the
economy not interest here in the United
States but in different countries now
Australia their retailers are continuing
to struggle and they really thought that
come January retail was going to spike
and rebound but the rebound failed and
it looks like during Christmas Christmas
sales were very very weak January retail
sales figures disappoint with weak
growth across most sectors the current
account deficit blows out by billions to
14 billion and we see at this point that
what we're looking at is the economies
around the world of developed nations
they are quickly falling apart now we
were meant to believe that the economies
around the world after 2008 everything
was improving it was getting better
don't worry about it
what really happened was was the central
banks they stepped in and they pumped
everything up just like a drug addict
where they pumped the druggie full of
drugs they feel great everything is
fantastic
until it all wears off and as it wears
off you start going through withdrawal
this is what we're seeing right now
they've done as much as they possibly
can and right now even if they add more
stimulus and they create more currency
it's not going to help the situation the
reason why it's not going to help is
because they can control the creation of
currency they can control the derivative
market they can control the stock market
they can make deals with different
countries where the people of the
countries take out loans to purchase
cars go to school and they can inflate
bubbles so people purchase homes
the one thing they can't really do is
have people go out get a nice paying job
and go spend that money that is their
main problem and this is this has been
their problem since 2008 the job market
has been declining wages have been
declining and we see at this point that
if you don't have that the spending in
retail is not going to happen the
purchases of homes cars student loans is
going to slow remember in the beginning
it's fantastic you're using someone
else's money you're borrowing that money
to purchase that house you're borrowing
money to purchase that car you're
borrowing money to go to school but the
thing that happens 6-7 years later is
that this money comes do or you need to
make payments throughout this time and
if more and more individuals are losing
jobs and more and more people are
getting part-time jobs because they lost
a job and they're not getting the cost
of living raises well all these loans it
starts to fall apart yes they can resort
to credit cards which we've seen they
can access their savings and as we've
seen as we went throughout the recovery
period that they've been telling us
about savings has declined rapidly
credit cards have increased rapidly and
we're coming to a point where the people
just don't have work there's a hundred
plus million people that are completely
out of the work force they're looking
for a job they would like to have a high
paying job and salaries have declined
since 2008 the high paying jobs have
been shipped out of this country this is
what we are saying now we've been kept
in this drugged up illusionary economy
and right now what is happening is it's
going to be shattered
and we're at that point where this is
being pushed right now and we can see
many different indicators that are
showing us signs that we are headed in
that direction one area we need to look
at is gold once they lose the
manipulation control of the gold market
the precious metals market you're gonna
see gold move up we seem go move up
quite a bit doesn't mean they're going
doesn't mean they're not gonna try to
smash it down I wouldn't be surprised in
a day or two all of a sudden we see
thousands of paper contracts come in and
smash it down and if they don't come in
and smash it down and it continually
moves up $20 $30 $40
you know they lost control which means
everything is in motion which means most
likely the market is going to come down
the dollar is going to decline even
further we're going to see inflation
we're gonna see all of it
but we are seeing many different
indicators if you look at Manhattan we
see the apartment sales of Manhattan
they've been declining they fell in
January to the lowest monthly rate since
February of 2012 this is a six year low
and it's trending downwards that
everything is declining right now and
what we're seeing is that prices are
coming down sales are coming down coops
condos they have dropped by 20% in
Manhattan it's all falling apart leases
are dropping right now we saw this these
type of signs back in 2008 in California
and then it came over to the East Coast
we're starting to see this in the big
cities where they pumped up the bubbles
and it's starting to fall apart we see
right now US factory orders they've
tumbled durable good plunged in January
and we see that US factory orders
tumbled by 1.4 percent this is the first
drop in six months and we're seeing that
transportation equipment is down by 10
percent non-defense aircraft is down by
negative 28 percent defense aircraft
down by negative 45 percent and it goes
on and on and on and what we're seeing
is a complete breakdown of this
system now the corporate media is out
there making a really big deal about
tariffs we talked about tariffs we
discussed what Bush tried to do back
many years ago when he was trying to
push tariffs on steel and everything
like that and the market well that would
have corrected it would have brought the
economy down Trump is putting a lot of
pressure on getting rid of what the
central bankers have done for years
where the deep state the central bankers
which are intertwined they've created
these deals that were not a benefit to
the people they were a benefit to
themselves NAFTA and the rest of the
trade deals they all have to go and
everything has to be wiped clean now
what's very interesting about these
tariffs is Europe is renewing their
tariffs on Chinese steel pipes as high
as seventy two percent and do you hear
anyone saying a word about this and the
European Commission came out and they
explained it had set final duties up
between eighteen and thirty five percent
for five years for producers including
bang gang steel plates hand in iron and
steel and has steel so we can see right
now that they already have tariffs now
the reason why the central bankers the
deep state the reason why they didn't do
any of this here in this country where
they made it very lopsided is because
they were pushing their system out of
the country to someplace else and they
were doing this on purpose because they
knew eventually what they wanted to do
and remember their plan was to implement
TPP bring down the United States to the
rest of the world the level of the
United the rest of the world and have
the United States as a third world
country the system then would be moved
to another country and they would accept
workers from all over the world and they
would not get paid us salaries they get
paid from whatever salary they were
getting from their country which means
the u.s. worker would have to lower
their requirements and the entire
country would completely change
this was their plan this is why they've
been pushing their agenda all this time
because they knew what they needed to do
they needed to reach that goal of
bringing the United States down to the
rest of the world and again this is
being shattered right now we see light
Hauser right now is saying listen than
half the talks they're not going well at
all NAFTA 2.0 it's not going well they
need to agree on roughly 30 chapters
they've only agreed on six now of course
all the other countries like Canada
Mexico and the rest they don't care
about making a deal they already have a

want NAFTA still doesn't and what is
what the approach he's taking right now
is to completely shatter the economic
system that was created by the central
bank by the deep state and he needs to
get rid of it
this is exactly what he is pushing for
and you can see by the way the corporate
media and everyone is reacting they
don't want this to end remember they
love their system everything subsidized
you're getting free money from the
central bank people become very very
wealthy in government they leave they
come in like you know they're making
$100,000 all of a sudden they're worth
millions upon millions upon millions of
dollars as they leaves govern as they
leave government so right now the system
that we're in is being ripped apart and
it's going to be reset now how long is
this reset going to last well if the
Trump administration and the Patriots
behind him have their way they're gonna
try to make it as easy as possible if
the central bankers went out it's going
to be rough very difficult and the
system is gonna come down very very hard
but either way you need to be prepared
because think about it we're on this
system for how many years now since the
70s when we went onto the petro dollar
and now it's being dismantled and as it
as its dismantled we're no longer going
to be the reserve currency which means
our way of living is going to change a
little bit I mean we will readjust we're
going to see inflation as countries dump
the dollar as they dump the Treasury
bonds as they dump everything and move
to a new system this is going to be a

fell people you know couldn't get
supplies credit froze up it was a
difficult time but if you're prepared
and you have food you have water you
have gold and silver crypto currencies
cash on hand for the beginning stages
you'll be able to weather the storm
that's the whole point of this so we can
see right now the whole system is going
to be shattered and as we move forward
you're gonna see a lot more coming out
and you're gonna see that the system's

rapidly so get prepared
listen everyone thanks a lot for

be prepared thanks a lot
